mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is an unsent postcard which has been torn into three separate pieces. The picture side of the card has a black and white photograph of a building identified as, "Castle Hill Hotel, Lexington, Va." The message side of the card is printed with, "Published by B. H. Gorrell, Druggist, Lexington, Va. Made in U. S. A." It is addressed to, "Miss Julia Price, Cismont, Va." The handwritten message is, "Blandome, Lexington, Va. Dear Miss Price, Just a card to let you know I am thinking of you. Would like to write you sometime. I am having a grand time here. Clarence Wood."
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Postcard from Clarence Wood to Miss Julia Price (correspondence)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Wood, Clarence M. (Clarence Mosby), Jr.
